name: AppointmentAssistantforOutlook(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa open appointment assistant”
”Alexa ask appointment assistant what's my next meeting”
”Alexa tell appointment assistant that I am running late”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: appointment assistant
des:
The "Appointment Assistant" skill will quickly tell you the name and time of the next meeting on your Outlook calendar. “Appointment Assistant” can, when asked, send a short message to the attendees/organizers of your next meeting (such as “I am running late” or “I will be there in 15 mins”). Meetings can be declined or canceled using the skill.

"Appointment Assistant" will also remind you of upcoming birthdays of your contacts and will offer to add a reminder to your Outlook Task List.

The "Appointment Assistant" skill requires access to calendar and task information in your Microsoft Outlook account to function properly. Email access is also required to send messages on your behalf. You will need an Outlook account, via Office 365, Active Directory, or Outlook.com, to use this skill.

Your personal information is never saved or stored.

This skill is not built by Microsoft nor endorsed by Microsoft.
